description: WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance audit for White Cross Healthcare Platform - review semantic HTML, forms, keyboard navigation, ARIA usage, and healthcare-specific accessibility

workstreams.description: Audit heading hierarchy, landmarks, and semantic element usage
Review form labels, error handling, and validation feedback
Test keyboard access, focus management, and skip links
Review ARIA patterns in components and pages
Verify color contrast ratios and visual accessibility

decisions.decision: Created unique task ID X7Y3Z9 to avoid conflict with existing api-architect work
Identified critical viewport zoom blocking as P0 issue - WCAG Level AA failure
Found healthcare-specific issues in medication administration - patient safety concern
Completed comprehensive audit - 8 violations identified, 10 quick wins documented

deliverables.name: WCAG Compliance Report
deliverables.description: Comprehensive 6-section accessibility audit with violations, fixes, and healthcare-specific recommendations

deliverables.name: Architecture Notes
deliverables.description: Accessibility patterns, ARIA strategy, and implementation notes

summary.wcagComplianceStatus: Partial AA - Critical issues require immediate attention
